channel.title: GFX Looping
channel.description: I have a question, do GFX loops from 1 second delay cause much lag?

item.title: GFX Looping
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Any of those Terms can be used to describe this situation, though some are more appropriate than others. You can stop arguing and start helping now.

Read full topic

item.title: GFX Looping
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

T h 3:

Eyeownyew is correct though, I hate when people just say GFX when they have no idea what they are even talking about.

Whoa, whoa, whoa… Quit being a hypocrite and look at your signature. GFX means graphics and in this case, it involves graphics. Imagine that…

Professional grade GFX artist looking for a decent project to brush up on some skills. Hit me up on skype, Username : Ahndeey

OT: I’m sure you could try doing something like the Fire cape. It may not turn out as good as it does in RuneScape, but that’s what should motivate you to do better.

Read full topic

item.title: GFX Looping
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

T h 3:

Eyeownyew is correct though, I hate when people just say GFX when they have no idea what they are even talking about.

en.wikipedia.org

GFX

GFX may refer to:


Notice which page it loads?

Also, eyeownyew, an acronym isn’t limited to the first letter of each word. Surely shortening Chief Executive Officer to CEO is just as lazy as shorting Graphics to GFX?

Read full topic

item.title: GFX Looping
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

For example, for woodcutting, you’d use a while statement.

while (c.playerSkilling[Skills.WOODCUTTING])
        c.startAnimation(WOODCUTTING_CUTTING_ANIM);

Read full topic

LOL guys why dont u get on sublect and answer his question, hes here for help, not to listen to you argue about “Terms”

item.title: GFX Looping
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:11, topic:477892”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=596091.msg4197219#msg4197219 date=1357683794]

The correct term is animation or gif… When you say gfx you sound retarded.

What auras?

GFX = graphics. GIF = image file. Animation = something/someone moving. So, the correct term in this scenario is GFX.

No… A gif is an animated image. Look up what “gif” stands for l0l

A gif can be a still image. Also, he is not talking about a gif, he is talking about an in-game graphic. So gfx is the correct term.

Gfx isn’t even a loveing term, it’s something people that are too lazy to spell words out say
[/quote]
It is a term… It’s an acronym for the word “graphics”.[/quote]
An acronym is a word such as CEO, where the letters are the first letter in each word. “Gfx” is just something lazy people say.

Read full topic

item.title: GFX Looping
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Mario PvP:

Like the aura’s from runescape… they glow and I think they loop a gfx to do that. I wanted to know if i did that, would it lag my server?

well this is a pretty stupid question

use a task to make it glow… and idk if it’ll lag your server it depends on the server itself.

Read full topic

item.title: GFX Looping
item.dc:creator: @T_h_3 T h 3
item.description:
@T_h_3 wrote:

Hes talking about a gif changing frames at a 1 second frame-rate I believe. And no, depending where you host the gif and where you have it displayed I’ve personally made them to .10 second framerates
